Content: Polities should have research doctrines, determining long term
research goals. So for 50 turns lasers, ablative armor and social
sciences are all the rage. The next 50 turns it is Gauss-cannons,
Ablative Armor and chemistry. This selection should be partially
random, so the polity does have a ''technological character'' but also
sometimes changes it. Otherwise the AI would be stuck on only now
strategy and therefore to predictable. Without a doctrine it would
either random walk or become a boring generalist.
